text: The sack of Northern Gujarat resulted in the victory of the Khwarezmians. ==Plunder== Jalaluddin Turkmen made an agreement with the Khohars, a mixed Muslim-Hindu Rajput people. Together with the Khohars, he marched against Nasirudin Kabacha, a Turk of Turkish origin who had established a rule in Multan. He raided the south and reached the Sind region and northern Gujarat.Ä°bn el-Esir... Cilt. XII, p.425-28 == References ==
title: Sack of North Gujarat (1224)
